title: Baby Carrier
description: dark blue, red; very tiny cross-stitch designs; one large square on top of graduated squares, and smaller and smaller snowflake motifs (red and white on blue); lower, wider block embroidered with three small squares outlined in red and white; PL portion of solid blue has white outlining (possibly for embroidery pattern); four different blue fabrics on reverse, one with batik design
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
